body_html:
Hi,

I have installed pytorch from sources on 3 different computers with CUDA 8.0 and ubuntu 16.04. The only difference between what is written in the README was to execute conda install libgcc before the installation. If it can help....

body:
Hi,

 I have installed pytorch from sources on 3 different computers with CUDA 8.0 and ubuntu 16.04. The only difference between what is written in the README was to execute `conda install libgcc` before the installation. If it can help....
